title: Hi, I'm facing issues with my new pixel 3a.
content: Hi, I recently bought pixel 3a, first issue i encountered is that i wasn't able do software update through wifi. After I updated to Android 10 through mobile data, I started facing another issue where in I wasn't able to clear applications running in background. I'm still facing issues with wifi connectivity.Kindly let me know if this issue is related to Android update or with the phone. If it's the latter then i would exchange the phone.
